item.title: Origins of Data Lake at Grofers
item.description: Originally published over lambda.grofers.com The Beginning As Data Engineers at the biggest online grocery company in India, one of our major challenges is to democratize data across the organization. But, when we began evaluating how well we were doing on this goal, we realized that frequent errors in our data pipelines had caused our business teams to lose confidence in data. As a result, they were never sure which data source is correct and apt to use for their analyses and had to consult the data platform team at every step.

Hi! I thrive to build awesome data tools and products at Grofers! I have wide experience in backend development and building data tools(most of it around overall 4-5 yrs). Currently I work as a Senior Software Eng.(Data) at Grofers with an awesome team of developers, here we are working on creating a unified data lake and democratize data access in organization. I mostly work on Python and Scala but also holds significant experience in Java and Php.
